Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Position (GEI)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B position vector (km) in GEI coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Velocity (GEI)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B velocity vector (km/s) in GEI coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Maneuver Flag
Parameter.Description:
THEMIS-B maneuver status code (XYYZZZ). Values indicate if/what maneuver is being performed.  Spacecraft data will be unreliable during maneuvers.

      * Unpowered flight (Coast):
          - X=0, Y=00, Z=000            
      * Sequence Code X:
          - 0= No Segmentation
          - 1= Segmented Maneuver
      * Type Code YY:
          - 0= No Maneuver
          - 1= Axial-thrust Maneuver
          - 2= Side-thrust Maneuver
          - 3= Beta-thrust Maneuver
          - 4= Attitude Precession
          - 5= Spin-Rate Change
      * Sequence Number ZZZ:
          - 001-999= Maneuver Sequence Number

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B RoI
Parameter.Description:
Region of interest. Different bits of this parameter give a general indication of the region thbt the spacecraft is in.  The first 18 bits are significant.  An active bit indicates the spacecraft is in a given region.  Multiple bits may be set simultaneously. The value of the bit is in parentheses in the following table.

          +---------------------------------------------------+
          | Bit 1(1)      | Earth Shadow                      |
          | Bit 2(2)      | Lunar Shadow                      |
          | Bit 3(4)      | Atmospheric absorbtion zone       |
          | Bit 4(8)      | South Atlantic Anomaly            |
          | Bit 5(16)     | Northern Auroral Zone             |
          | Bit 6(32)     | Southern Auroral Zone             |
          | Bit 7(64)     | Perigee Passage                   |
          | Bit 8(128)    | Inner & Outer Radiation Belts |
          | Bit 9(256)    | Deep Plasma Sphere                |
          | Bit 10(512)   | Foreshock Solar Wind              |
          | Bit 11(1024)  | Solar Wind Beam                   |
          | Bit 12(2048)  | High Magnetic Field               |
          | Bit 13(4096)  | Average Plasma Sheet              |
          | Bit 14(8192)  | Bowshock Crossing                 |
          | Bit 15(16384) | Magnetopause Crossing             |
          | Bit 16(32768) | Ground Based Observatories        |
          | Bit 17(65536) | 2-Day Conjunctions                |
          | Bit 18(131072)| 4-Day Conjunctions                |
          +---------------------------------------------------+

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Right Ascension
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B spin axis right ascension in GEI coordinates.
Parameter.Caveats: Measured from GEI x-axis towards GEI y-axis.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Declination
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B spin axis declination in GEI coordinates.
Parameter.Caveats: Measured from GEI x-y axis towards GEI z-axis.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Alpha
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B spin axis azimuth, Euler alpha, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Beta
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B spin axis colatitude, Euler beta, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Period
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B spin period, regularized and boxcar averaged.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin PhaseAngle
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-B angle rotated since the sun sensor registered the sun pulse, regularized and boxcar averaged.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Time
Parameter.Description: Time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00.

Parameter.Name: Spin Correction Time
Parameter.Description: Spin correction time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Initial Spin Period
Parameter.Description: Initial spin period for segment.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Time
Parameter.Description: Spin time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin End Time
Parameter.Description: Segment end time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Drift Term ('c')
Parameter.Description: Drift term for spin rate
Parameter.Caveats: Applies to angular velocity (deg/sec), not spin period.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Correction
Parameter.Description: Spin phase correction from definitive position and field model calculated at 1 minute intervals

Parameter.Name: Spin Axis Right Ascension Correction
Parameter.Description: Spin axis right ascension correction from definitive position and field model

Parameter.Name: Spin Axis Declination Correction
Parameter.Description: Spin axis declination correction from definitive position and field model

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Phase Error
Parameter.Description: Maximum absolute phase error between model and non-outlier sun crossing time.
Parameter.Caveats: Errors due to recognized BAU timing errors do not contribute to this quantity.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Spin Number
Parameter.Description: Number of spins contained in this segment.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Sample Number
Parameter.Description: Number of samples (points) contained in this segment.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Pulse Gap
Parameter.Description: Duration, in seconds, of longest gap between sun pulses in this segment. Long gaps (60 sec or more) will generally indicate shadow periods.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Position (GSE)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft position vector (km) in GSE coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Position (GSM)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft position vector (km) in GSM coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Velocity (GSE)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft velocity (km/s) in GSE coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-B Velocity (GSM)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft velocity (km/s) in GSM coordinates.
